Job Title: Three G Stack Software Development Engineer
Job Description: 3G Stack Software Development Engineer    Bangalore /   R&D Software Engineering /   Full Time   3G Stack Development  What you'll do:    Design and development of new features on BTS/nodeB/eNodbe     writing system and design specification and unit test plan     Taking the ownership of the feature and work with cross functional teams to successful delivery of the feature     Understanding of end to end scenario and troubleshooting/fixing of field and QA reported issues   What you must have:    Minimum 06-10 years experience in 1 RAT development     Protocol development experience in WCDMA/HSPA     strong hold on C, C++, SW architecture     Good understanding of best practice software engineering processes, version control, testing and release cycles     Strong communication skills     Excellent understanding of 3GPP standards     Solid understanding of Linux OS internals, TCP/IP, multi-threading     Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required     Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
